title: How many people have you seen that look like Hitler? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve seen a cat that looked exactly like Hitler. It was a black and white cat with a white head and black marking under its nose like a Hitler mustache and then the top of its head was black with part of the marking swooping down onto the face just like Hitler’s hairdo. It was a feral cat that lived under an apartment building next to where my friend lived in Korea town in Los Angeles. I kept trying to catch the cat, because everyone needs a cat who looks exactly like Hitler, especially me. I was going to call him “Der Furrer” see this website dedicated to cats like that. Cats That Look Like Hitler! As for seeing a person looking like Hitler, no, not so much. I think people avoid those little chock a block mustaches now because of him. It seemed that Charlie Chaplin had one too, but that was earlier, so I guess Hitler looked like Charlie Chaplin actually.
Not many people but…  Source: Cats That Look Like Hitler! An entire website on them! (I think the on of the right looks more like him, but the one on the left looks the more “fur-er”)
